import React from 'react'; import { XCircle, CheckCircle, FileText, Download } from 'lucide-react'; import { formatCurrency, formatDate } from '../Utility/formatters'; import APHeader from '../components/AccountsReceivable/RecordPaymentModal'; const InvoiceDetailModal = ({ invoice, onClose, getCustomerName }) => { const [isPaymentModalOpen, setPaymentModalOpen] = useState(false); return (

Order Details - #{invoice.orderId}

{/* Order Info */}

{invoice.orderId}

{getCustomerName(invoice.customerId)}

{formatDate(invoice.createdAt)}

{invoice.status}

{invoice.paid ? 'Paid' : 'Unpaid'}
{invoice.fulfilled ? 'Fulfilled' : 'Pending'}

{formatCurrency(invoice.total)}

{formatCurrency(invoice.payableAmount)}

{/* Line Items */}

Order Items

{invoice.lineItems.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Product Quantity Unit Price Total Status
{item.productName} {item.quantity} {formatCurrency(item.price)} {formatCurrency(item.total)} {item.status}
{/* Totals */}
Subtotal: {formatCurrency(invoice.subTotal)}
Tax ({invoice.taxRate}%): {formatCurrency(invoice.taxAmount)}
{invoice.discountAmount > 0 && (
Discount: -{formatCurrency(invoice.discountAmount)}
)}
Total: {formatCurrency(invoice.total)}
{/* Action Buttons */}
{!invoice.paid && ( )} {!invoice.fulfilled && ( )}
); }; export default InvoiceDetailModal;
